title: Magazine crit
content:
Hi,

My first post on Typophile. Some friends and I put together an online magazine for which I - an amateur graphic designer - did the layout. A lot of my inspiration for the layout came from Intelligent Life magazine.

If you have a moment, please have a look I would greatly appreciate any critique.

[Exhibit Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422211740/http:/exhibitmag.co.za/)

Thanks,  
Rudolf.
author: rvavruch
